The location of the center of the ball.
paint(Graphics) - Method in class model.Ball
The following method paints the ball on the canvas based on its color field, location and its radius.
paint(Graphics) - Method in interface view.IV2MUpdateAdapter
This is the method the view will call to update its canvas based on the model.

Paints the host onto the given Graphics context.

paintCfg(Graphics, Ball) - Method in class model.paint.UprightImagePaintStrategy
Augments the inherited paint method to add flipping of the image to keep it upright whenever the ball is going towards the left.
paintCfg(Graphics, Ball) - Method in class model.paint.UprightMultiPaintStrategy
Augments the inherited paint method to add flipping of the image to keep it upright whenever the ball is going towards the left.
paintCfg(Graphics, Ball) - Method in class model.paint.UprightShapePaintStrategy
Override paintCfg to add the transform needed to keep the shape upright at all times.

paintXfrm(Graphics, Ball, AffineTransform) - Method in class model.paint.ShapePaintStrategy

paintXfrm(Graphics, Ball, AffineTransform) - Method in class model.paint.strategy.BallPaintStrategy

poly - Variable in class model.paint.shape.PolygonFactory
The Polygon shape to use as the prototype.
PolygonFactory - Class in model.paint.shape
Concrete IShapeFactory that provides the invariant behavior to instantiate a Shape that is a Polygon.
PolygonFactory(AffineTransform, double, Point...) - Constructor for class model.paint.shape.PolygonFactory
Constructor that uses an externally defined AffineTransform for internal use plus takes the defining points of the prototype Polygon and a scale factor to scale the given points to the desired unit size.
